name: dx_to_vgp_s3_file_transfer
title: DNAnexus to VGP S3 Exporter
summary: Transfers files from the DNAnexus platform to VGP's external S3 bucket

inputSpec.name: worker_max
inputSpec.label: Maximum number of workers to distribute upload
inputSpec.help: This app will distribute work across workers. This parameter limits the number of subjobs created

inputSpec.name: bandwidth
inputSpec.label: Bandwith
inputSpec.help: This parameter will determine whether the worker performing the data transfer will have a NORMAL or HIGH bandwidth connection.

inputSpec.name: species_name
inputSpec.label: Species name
inputSpec.help: This parameter provides the species name for the given data.  If not provided, we will look for a project property called species_name.  If neither is provided, the app will throw an error.

inputSpec.name: f_ids
inputSpec.label: Files
inputSpec.help: Files to upload to external S3 bucket.

outputSpec.name: upload_report
outputSpec.label: Results of export
outputSpec.help: Text file containing an overview of export success/failures.  Ideally an all "copy" with no "FAIL" will always show

details.whatsNew: * 1.0.0 Easy export of files to VGP's S3 bucket.
